pages.text: $(li)The Nether Quartz is a hard crystaline mineral that can be found and mined over the Nether.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/mason)Masons$(/l) will exchange your Nether Quartz by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft multiple items in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

pages.title: Nether Quartz Recipes
pages.text: $(li)Laboratory Blocks$(li)Quartz Glass$(li)$(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/blackboard)Blackboard$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/observer)Observer$(/l)$(li)Block of Quartz$(li)Decorative Quartz Amphora$(li)Small Decorative Quartz Pot$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/comparator)Redstone Comparator$(/l)$(li)Diorite$(li)Granite$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/daylight_detector)Daylight Detector$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:armors/quartz_armor)Quartz Armor$(/l)
